ive got a flashed (since wave 3) samsung drive in my xbox360, i didnt need to have that reflashed for kinect. 
to play my kinect games i insert the wave 4 activation disc, play it, remove it when promted then i put in a burned kinect game and they work perfectly!! ive played wave 6/7 games with ap2.5 (assassins creed brotherhood) worked perfectly after i used the wave 4 activate.

my boyfriend on the other hand, has a flashed lite on drive in his xbox360 (which is pants..) which worked the same as mine until now, he needs to be reflash his, just because it doesnt work the same way as my samsung, just becuase its a "lite on" drive. 

"lite on" drives are shit
